text: was a Japanese women's football team which played in Nadeshiko League. ==Club name== *YKK Tohoku Ladies SC Flappers : 1997 - 2003 *YKK AP Tohoku Ladies SC Flappers : 2004 *TEPCO Mareeze : 2005 - 2011 == Results == Season Domestic League National Cup League Cup League Note League Level Place Tms. ==Other websites== Category:1997 establishments in Japan Category:2010s disestablishments in Japan Category:2011 disestablishments Category:Japanese football clubs Category:Fukushima Prefecture
